content: sweet cables a little twists here and there always make my heart sing and this pair of socks is all about the mirroring cable motifs wandering their way up the feet and the leg all the way to the cuff ribbing sulo socks are knitted from toe up using gusset increases to make the pair fit nicely choose a yarn that shows the cables like the semisolid pink i used in the sample pair **materials** ***yarn *** 1 1 skein of säie sock classic by säie wool in colorway oh so pretty approx 400 440 yards / 360 400 meters of fingering weight yarn ***needles *** us 1½ 2 5 mm and us 0 2 mm dpns or circular needles if you are using magic loop technique for small circumference knitting **sizing** 1 2 ***finished circumference of the foot and of the leg of the sock *** 7 5 9 / 19 22 cm **gauge** 32 sts and 44 row = 4 10 cm on larger needles in stockinette stitch after blocking *note the cable pattern instructions are charted only * direct pdf 1 1 https //www kodinkuvalehti fi/s3fs-public/wysiwyg_images/sk_1_23_sulo_sukat_korjattu_ohje pdf
